title: Getting Started with Flask
excerpt: Learn how to build your first web application using Flask, a lightweight WSGI web application framework in Python...
content:
Flask is a lightweight WSGI web application framework in Python. It's designed to be simple and easy to get started with, while also being powerful enough to build complex web applications.

Here's a simple Flask application:

```python
from flask import Flask
app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route('/')
def hello():
    return 'Hello, World!'
```
